review: I received this device and it worked fine but didn't offer anything that didn't require a paid subscription. I already had a device through my DVD played which did the same. I can see any reason to pay $99 for this. Amazon should at least offer one year free subscription to Amazon Prime with this device.
author: THOMAS E COMOLLO

review: A great buy when bundled with the fire hdx and a Amazon Prime Membership. With the cost of Netflix and cable tv packages going up all the time, you can watch all the movies you want for $99 a Year. That's $8.25 a month. Plus prime now has free music.
author: RCW

review: I can't really rate it because it won't work on the TV I bought it for.  This TV doesn't have the port needed to allow the TV Fire to work.  I'll have to return it unless my grandson can use it.
author: Sybil E. Harrison

review: I think everyone should have this as it makes it so easy to tune in to programs, and movies. We use it all the time.
author: Ed

review: We love it.  Actually just bought a second for upstairs so we could stop moving it from room to room.  Considering buying a third.  Have told all of our friends about it.  We are looking to get rid of our cable once and for all (bought this for a patio TV that couldn't get cable to it).  Set up is easy, content is great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not as many channels as Roku or it would get 5 star...  However, it looks like the channels and integration with KidsFreeTime is coming.  Great addition to my Prime membership and should be better by end of year.  Also - I gave the rental setbox back to the cable company a while back so this fits right into my house.
author: JC

review: Worked straight out of the box and preconfigured with my details.Streaming is seemless and great quality.My CloudDrive photos and videos were ready to view without doing a thing.My only dislike is that not all content is included in my Prime membership.

review: This is the most amazing device to watch tv shows and movies on especially if you subscribe to Amazon Prime, Netflix or Hulu. I have not regretted a single moment of purchasing this item.
